events.message: I am reporting a car accident that occurred yesterday when another vehicle collided with mine at an intersection.
The claim has been categorised under 'Auto Accident' after reviewing the initial incident description and vehicle damage.
An insurance agent has been assigned to your case to guide you through the claim process and handle communications.
Your claim regarding the car collision has been formally acknowledged, and we will begin steps for further assessment.
Please provide the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and your driver’s license to proceed with the investigation.
I have submitted all requested documents including police report and photos, hoping this will speed up the claim process.
Our claims department has begun the investigation into your auto accident to determine liability and damage extent.
The investigation has been completed with findings confirming the other party’s liability in the collision.
We have proposed a settlement offer that covers the repair costs for your vehicle and any related expenses.
I appreciate the quick response and the fair settlement offer proposed to cover all damage repair costs promptly.
Your claim has been officially approved, and the settlement terms have been finalized for payment processing.
The payment for your claim has been issued directly to your bank account to cover the car repair expenses.
Your auto accident claim is now closed. We hope everything has been resolved to your satisfaction.
All records related to your auto accident claim have been archived securely for any future reference requirements.
